name: test_e2e_with_logs[525_GQL_DATA_007]
description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DATA_007` |
| **Name** | GraphQL mass extraction with limit and ssn |

| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
